channel.title: Turn your webcam into a security camera! [Beware 56k'ers - pics]
channel.description:
Hello boys and girls! In this tutorial, I will show you how to turn your webcam into a security camera, with [url=http://dorgem.sourceforge.net/]Dorgem![/url].
[url=http://www.codejacked.com/turn-your-webcam-into-a-security-camera-in-linux/]Linux users click me! Thanks to kMB! :D[/url]
If you haven't already, download [url=http://dorgem.sourceforge.net/]Dorgem(0.4mb)[/url] and install it. Once done, select your webcam and click preview to make sure it's the right one.
[img]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/2055/untitledsi4.png[/img]
Basically, click options, select "Use motion detection" and ok.
[img]http://img214.imageshack.us/img214/535/twohs5.png[/img]
Now, I'll be storing the images on my machine, but you can store them using ftp as well. Go to "Store setting", select your storage type and press ok. I'll name my cam 'niall's cam', make sure "Enable" is selected. Put the interval to 1-2 seconds, or higher if the area your monitoring has a lot of motion. As I already said, I'm storing them on my pc but if your choosing something else, simply follow the instructions. In the folder, you can browse where to save them, I'm using \My Documents\Webcamtut\, and saving it as "Niallcam [b]%G%g[/b]", Dorgem allows advanced characters in the file name, %G is the current year, and %g is the current month, week, hour, minute, second, so "%G%g" is basically the year, month, week, hour, minute, second. I highly recommend doing this, as if you just use something like "Niallcam", it will over-write it's self. Once you've done that, click ok!
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/5600/threebr3.png[/img]
Now, make sure auto-capture's on and have fun!
Tip: To use this on 2 or more webcams, simply copy the .exe file(C:\Program Files\Dorgem\Dorgem.exe) rename it to add "1" on the end and run that, and do the whole process over again.
FAQ:
Q: It won't take pictures of motion! A: Did you set the interval to a low one?
Q: What is the purpose of this? A: Well basically, what this tutorial sets your webcam up to do is save a picture every-time it detects motion, it can be used at a cheap-security camera and such.
If you have any questions, feel free to post them.

item.title: Turn your webcam into a security camera! [Beware 56k'ers - pics]
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

mykah093:

As you have said, this tutorial sets our web cam up. This security camera saves a picture every time it detects motion. So how can we beware and sure that we are safe by using this security camera? Thank you!

Ah mykah, you raise a good point there. But here’s the thing - Safety is the state of being “safe” (from French sauf), the condition of being protected against physical, social, spiritual, financial, political, emotional, occupational, psychological, educational or other types or consequences of failure, damage, error, accidents, harm or any other event which could be considered non-desirable. Safety can also be defined to be the control of recognized hazards to achieve an acceptable level of risk. This can take the form of being protected from the event or from exposure to something that causes health or economical losses. It can include protection of people or of possessions.

A tutorial is one method of transferring knowledge and may be used as a part of learning.

Hope to read more from you mykah, thanks!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

davidude36:

ooo one of my friends was talking about this at school… i wonder if it will work with my video camera…

I’m not sure how to do this(since I don’t have a modern one), but I assume if it can connect through the USB, there will be software for it.

[quote=“Ron, post:2, topic:100351”]Woah! That’s a sick tutorial The UnNamed!

I don’t have any prying eyes though, but if I did, and if I had a webcam, I would definitely use this.[/quote]

Well my upstairs neighbours are assholes and recently, they came into out back garden and went to attack my mum(long story short, she smacked em with a rake and they phoned the police claiming she assaulted them when it was self defense) so I got searching and found this, a very-low cost, low-harddrive space security camera.

Read full topic
